item.title: 泰国和印尼希望在 2026 年的洛矶山脉实施宽松货币政策
item.description: 进入 2026 年，东南亚最大的两个经济体都将采取更宽松的货币政策，因为它们面临着国内政治动荡、国外投资者戒心和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）边境关税带来的经济风险。【原文：Two of Southeast Asia’s largest economies head into 2026 tilting toward looser monetary policy as they face economic risks from political turmoil at home, investor wariness abroad and Donald Trump’s tariffs at the border.】

item.title: 市场呼吁欧洲停止降息
item.description: 越来越多的交易商押注，欧洲各国央行的降息行动已接近尾声。【原文：Traders are increasingly betting that central banks across Europe are all but done with interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 印度撤军，装载俄罗斯石油的油轮在中国近海集结
item.description: 在西方制裁之后，俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔石油的最大买家印度减少了对该产品的购买，此后，一支满载俄罗斯乌拉尔石油的油轮船队在中国东海岸附近扩大。【原文：A fleet of tankers laden with Russia’s flagship Urals oil has expanded off China’s east coast after India — the biggest buyer of the grade — curbed purchases following Western sanctions.】

item.title: 银行监管机构考虑收紧 SRT 披露准则
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴塞尔银行监管委员会正在制定相关提案，以加强银行对其使用合成风险转移的披露。【原文：The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision is working on proposals to step up bank disclosures about their use of synthetic risk transfers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国商业前景恶化程度超出预期
item.description: 德国 12 月商业信心下滑，凸显了这个欧洲最大经济体在克服多年经济疲软方面所面临的挑战。【原文：German business confidence dipped in December, underscoring the challenges for Europe’s largest economy to overcome years of economic weakness.】

item.title: 吉尔吉斯斯坦崛起为中亚新 "老虎经济
item.description: 这个被挤压在中国和哈萨克斯坦之间的小国，正在定位成为中亚新的经济 "老虎"，利用转口贸易、汇款和旅游业的蓬勃发展吸引重要的外国投资。【原文：A small nation squeezed between China and Kazakhstan is positioning itself to be central Asia’s new tiger economy as it capitalizes on a boom in re-exports, remittances and tourism to attract vital foreign investment.】

item.title: 与中国官员争吵后，PDD解雇数十名工人
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，PDD 控股公司在上海解雇了一个政府关系团队，原因是该公司员工与对其进行检查的中国监管机构发生了争吵。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc. fired a government relations team in Shanghai following a fistfight between employees and Chinese regulators who were performing checks at the e-commerce company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛预计 2026 年意大利并购案将在银行和科技公司的推动下增多
item.description: 高盛集团预计，在银行、技术、电信和制药行业的推动下，2026 年意大利的并购活动将继续扩大。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expects M&A activity in Italy to continue to expand in 2026, driven by banks, technology, telecom and pharmaceutical sectors.】

item.title: 亿万富翁汽车家族将罗伯特-标致留在 Stellantis 董事会
item.description: 法国亿万富翁汽车王朝将延长罗伯特-标致（Robert Peugeot）在 Stellantis NV 董事会的任期，此前他曾与另一位继承人竞争这一职位。【原文：France’s billionaire auto dynasty will extend the board mandate of Robert Peugeot at Stellantis NV after he competed with another heir for the role.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧以 23 亿美元向朝日出售东非啤酒股份
item.description: 帝亚吉欧集团（Diageo Plc）同意以 23 亿美元的价格将其在东非啤酒有限公司（East African Breweries Ltd.）的多数股权出售给日本朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）。【原文：Diageo Plc agreed to sell its majority stake in East African Breweries Ltd. to Japan’s Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. in a $2.3 billion deal as the struggling UK distiller seeks to spur growth by paring back non-core operations.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-卡兰尼克的云厨公司据说将推迟中东部门的首次公开募股（IPO
item.description: 云厨（CloudKitchens）是优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.据熟知内情的人士透露，优步首席执行官特拉维斯-卡兰尼克（Travis Kalanick）已经推迟了其中东业务的上市计划。【原文：CloudKitchens, a startup run by former Uber Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Travis Kalanick, has delayed plans to list its Middle Eastern business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Flutter 旗下 Paddy Power 和 Betfair 遭英国监管机构罚款 200 万英镑
item.description: Flutter Entertainment Plc 旗下的 Paddy Power 和 Betfair 被罚款 200 万英镑（270 万美元），因为英国博彩委员会的调查发现它们没有足够快地识别出潜在的问题赌博。【原文：Flutter Entertainment Plc brands Paddy Power and Betfair have been fined £2 million ($2.7 million) after a UK Gambling Commission investigation found they hadn’t identified potential problem gambling quickly enough.】

item.title: 英国通胀不及预期，英镑创一个月最大跌幅
item.description: 在英国通胀率低于预期后，英镑创下一个月来的最大单日跌幅，这也推高了对英国央行明年将不得不进行更多降息的押注。【原文：The pound headed for its biggest one-day drop in a month after UK inflation came in softer than expected, boosting bets that the Bank of England will have to deliver more interest rate cuts next year.】

item.title: 亿万富翁卡斯特尔的啤酒帝国因家族和首席执行官分裂而动荡不安
item.description: 法国亿万富翁皮埃尔-卡斯特（Pierre Castel）的神秘啤酒和葡萄酒帝国进入了一个动荡时期，因为一名继承人从一家重要的控股公司辞职，首席执行官公开撰文称高层内部出现骚动。【原文：French billionaire Pierre Castel’s secretive beer and wine empire has entered a period of turmoil after an heir resigned from a key holding company and the CEO wrote publicly of agitation within the top echelons.】

item.title: 南非通胀意外放缓提振降息希望
item.description: 南非 11 月份的年度通胀率意外走软，逐渐接近央行新设定的 3% 的目标，此举将刺激下月降息的希望。【原文：South Africa’s annual inflation unexpectedly softened in November, edging closer to the central bank’s new 3% target in a move that will encourage hopes for an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 外国资金外流令印尼盾下挫，印尼维持利率不变
item.description: 印尼银行在今年的最后一次会议上维持了基准利率不变，以应对外资持续外流对印尼盾造成的压力。【原文：Bank Indonesia held its benchmark interest rate at its last meeting for the year to head off pressure on the rupiah amid persistent foreign capital outflows.】

item.title: Monzo 获得爱尔兰银行牌照，进军欧洲市场
item.description: Monzo已获得爱尔兰银行执照，此举将使这家英国数字贷款公司能够进军整个欧盟市场。【原文：Monzo has received an Irish banking license, a move that will allow the UK digital lender to expand into markets across the European Union.】

item.title: 涨幅达 95% 后，Meesho 成为 2025 年印度表现最佳的大型 IPO
item.description: Meesho Ltd. 周三大涨约 20%，延续了上市后的大涨势头，使该电子商务平台成为印度 2025 年表现最好的主要 IPO。【原文：Meesho Ltd. jumped about 20% on Wednesday, extending a post-listing surge that made the e-commerce platform India’s best-performing major IPO of 2025.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英国通胀降幅超预期
item.description: 英国通胀率下滑至八个月来的最低水平，降幅超过预期，交易商认为这几乎注定了英国央行将于周四降息。【原文：UK inflation slipped to its lowest level in eight months, a bigger-than-expected drop that traders saw as all but sealing an interest-rate cut at the Bank of England on Thursday.】

item.title: 泰铢影响经济增长，泰国如期降息
item.description: 泰国央行将其关键利率降至 2022 年以来的最低点，以支持受顽固的强势货币和新的政治不确定性拖累的脆弱经济。【原文：The Bank of Thailand cut its key interest rate to the lowest since 2022 to bolster a fragile economy weighed down by a stubbornly strong currency and renewed political uncertainty.】

item.title: 中国股市突然反弹，科技公司领涨
item.description: 中国股市在下午的交易中大幅上涨，因为市场对中国科技股的热情再度高涨。【原文：Chinese stocks rose sharply in afternoon trading as enthusiasm around the nation’s technology shares returned.】

item.title: 英国通胀放缓幅度超过预期
报道称巴基斯坦将出售国旗航空公司 PIA 75% 的股份
item.description: 巴基斯坦计划出售国旗航空公司的控股权，这是一家长期陷入困境的企业，对政府的私有化进程至关重要。【原文：Pakistan plans to sell a controlling stake in the national flag carrier, a long-struggling enterprise central to the government’s privatization drive.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革有可能为银行制造 "基础陷阱
item.description: 据法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）称，荷兰养老基金在转向新的投资模式时，预计将平仓利率掉期交易，从而使银行面临 "基差陷阱"。【原文：Dutch pension funds are expected to unwind interest-rate swap trades as they move to a new investing model, leaving banks exposed to a “basis trap,” according to Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 投资者为何担心日本债券市场
item.description: 日本长期债券的收益率在 12 月初达到了多年来的高点，表明投资者在担心政府支出增加和 12 月 19 日可能加息的情况下需求疲软。【原文：Yields on Japan’s long-dated bonds reached multi-year highs in early December, signaling weak investor demand amid concerns about increased government spending and the possibility of an interest-rate hike on Dec. 19.】

item.title: 危机加深，万科将在深圳与保险公司和银行会面
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.）将于周三在深圳与一些保险公司和商业银行会面。【原文：China Vanke Co., once the nation’s biggest homebuilder and now at the epicenter of the years-long property crisis, is set to meet in Shenzhen with some insurance firms and commercial banks on Wednesday, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官称需求增长将支撑油价
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，尽管本周石油价格因对全球石油供应过剩的担忧加剧而下滑，但石油需求的增长将有助于支撑价格。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said rising demand for oil will help to underpin prices, despite their slump this week on growing concerns about a global surplus.】

item.title: 印度卢比在印度央行的支持下反弹，创七个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 在印度中央银行积极抛售美元以支撑货币之后，印度卢比对美元的汇率创下了七个月来的最大升幅。【原文：India’s rupee strengthened the most in seven months versus the dollar after the central bank sold dollars aggressively to support the currency.】

item.title: 中国加强大豆拍卖，从美国购买更多大豆
item.description: 中国正在从国家储备中大量出售大豆，同时加大从美国的采购力度，以履行两国在 10 月底达成的一项明显协议。【原文：China is selling large volumes of soybeans from its state reserves, as it steps up purchases from the US to fulfill an apparent agreement between the two countries in late October.】

item.title: 日本汽车工会主席担心日本央行加息可能阻碍工资增长
item.description: 日本汽车工人工会负责人表示，他担心如果日本央行如外界普遍预期的那样在周五上调基准利率，此举可能会影响企业在下一财年提高工资的能力。【原文：The head of Japan’s auto workers union said he’s concerned that if the central raises its benchmark interest rate Friday — as is widely expected — the move could weigh on companies’ ability to raise wages in the coming fiscal year.】
